timeline.bodyText: how did you come up with this list? is there a script that lists them?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: Unfortunately there is none ! I used the cheat sheet and my own judgement along with help from @alzimmermsft
replies.author: azabbasi

timeline.bodyText: Jackson should be available transitively through azure core and netty should not be included in this list. Http clients are pluggable and netty can be replaced by another http client.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure if we should open anything up specifically for netty.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to open this for core?
timeline.author: srnagar
